MS MCQs

    Initialize data during extension installation in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. When is installation code run in Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central?

      Extension install code is run when an extension is installed or reinstalled.

      Extension install code is run when an extension is published for the first time.

      Extension install code is run when an unpublished version is published again.


    2. How do you indicate that a codeunit is an installation codeunit?

      An install codeunit has the Type property set to Installation.

      An install codeunit has the Type property set to Install.

      An install codeunit has the Subtype property set to Install.

      An install codeunit has the Subtype property set to Installation.
